name: Blob Blaster 2
description:
Controls
  • wasd to move
  • cursor keys to shoot
  • Space to Jump, 
  • Left Shift to dive straight down

You have to destroy all of the blobs.  3 shots seems to be enough to take one out.  Good luck!

Hints

Look for the shadows on the ground.  They are directly below the platform.  Use your own shadow to position your dive.
